p: Before estimating Equation (11), we applied panel unit root tests to examine whether the variables were stationary or not, and the results indicated they were stationary (please refer to Appendix A). Equation (11) was estimated to see whether there were one, two, or three thresholds. Table 2 displays the results of the threshold effect tests, including the test statistics F 1, F 2, F 3 and their corresponding bootstrap p-values.
